function.name: cookingTemperature_decrease
function.description: This function is used to lower the temperature of the cooker.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to lower the temperature.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment within the device to lower the temperature.

cookingTemperatureDelta.description: The amount by which to decrease the cooking temperature.
